p: Sarilumab is another human monoclonal antibody against the interleukin-6 receptor. It binds to soluble and membrane-bound IL-6 receptors and inhibits IL-6-mediated signaling via these receptors. There is a growing body of evidence confirming the benefit of targeting the IL-6 pathway in patients with COVID-19, most notably in a recent single-arm study in China with tocilizumab in critically ill COVID-19 patients [ 94].
